TopicTitle: Come ONE! Come ALL! I have good NEWS!

Articles.Content:
I heard on the daily kerbal that They are going to upgrade to Unity 4.2.2!

Hopefully this might make KSP run better!

:D:D:D:D:D:D:D:D:D:D:D:D:D

Unlikely to improve performance. It looks like a bugfix release, primarily focusing on mobile platforms. I doubt we'll notice a difference, beyond maybe a couple bug fixes.

http://unity3d.com/unity/whats-new/unity-4.2.2
Good news. But there is only one problem...
Isn't the current version of unity 4.3.something? o_O

Unlikely to improve performance. It looks like a bugfix release, primarily focusing on mobile platforms. I doubt we'll notice a difference, beyond maybe a couple bug fixes.

http://unity3d.com/unity/whats-new/unity-4.2.2

Annnnnnnd there goes my excitement. Nonetheless, thanks for the information.
